frontMatter.title: The Big List of Naughty Strings
frontMatter.summary: The Big List of Naughty Strings is a list of strings which have a high probability of causing issues when used as user-input data.

next.title: Internet Protocol - IPv4 vs IPv6 as Fast As Possible
next.summary: IPv4 vs IPv6... Why do we need to transition from the Internet Protocol that's served us so well for all these years? Maybe because we're completely running out of IP addresses!
